SEARCH
Package booking.model

Class Room

java.lang.Object
booking.model.Room
public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents a room in a hotel. It contains details about the room's price, availability, type, and capacity.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Elina Hossain

    • Room

      public Room(String typeName, String description, boolean isAvailable, double price, int capacity)
      Constructor to create a Room object with price, availability, type, and capacity.
      Parameters:
      typeName - the type of the room
      description - description of the room
      isAvailable - whether the room is available
      price - the price of the room
      capacity - the maximum capacity of the room
